definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ez Eze 28:24 thornbush, thorn;—abs. ´[[ק]]: Ge 3:18 + ; pl. [[קׂחִים]] Ex 22:5 +, [[קוֹחִים]] Is 33:12 +; cstr. [[קוֹחֵי]] Ju Jdg 8:7, Jdg 8:16;—

thornbush, + [[דַּרְדַּר]] (q.v.) Ge 3:18 (J), Ho 10:8; + [[שָׁמִיד]] Is 32:13; + [[בַּרְקָנִים]] (q.v.), [[הַמִדְבָּר]] ´[[ק]]: Ju Jdg 8:7, Jdg 8:16; ´[[ק]]: alone Ex 22:5 (E); [[בְּאֵשׁ קוֹחִים]] Ps 118:12 (sim. of foes); in various fig., Is 33:12, Je 4:3, Je 12:13.
thorn, fig, Ez Eze 28:24 (c. [[מַכְאִב]], v. ‖[[סִלּוֹן ]]; q.v.); sim. [[מֻנׇד]] ´[[כְּק]]: 2Sa 23:6 (Perles:Anal.53 conj. [[מׂץ]], but v. also [[נוד]]
